Articles.Content:
The Hermes SM-1 OUV is as the name suggests. Perfect for a quick trip to the Mun, crew swapping, or if your satellite/space station needs to be serviced. For example, the electric charge on my station ran out before I could open the solar panels. (That was my fault, I forgot to open them.) So I Launched and rendezvoused with the station, then EVA'ed and opened the panels manually!

It also has a specialized launcher for it, much like the Soyuz, but the design takes after the Angara/H-IIB. It is efficient and versatile, with SM-1R(2 LRBs) & SM-1C (no LRBs) variations. The image below is the standard version w/ 4 LRBs, after booster separation. Note the OUV up top.

6S Service Compartment
